Class ConfigLoader

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class ConfigLoader
extends java.util.Properties
    Class to load config files to setup AutoDocTool.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe

    • Method Detail

      • loadConfig

        public void loadConfig(java.lang.String filepath)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Load the config file, recursiveExpand property implicit terms and configureComponents.
        Parameters:
        filepath - String containing the path to the config file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file was not found or ocurred an I/O error.
        AutoDocException - if parsing of some entry fails.

      • expandTerms

        public void expandTerms()
        Expand all implicit expandable terms between '${' and '}'.

      • recursiveExpand

        protected java.lang.String recursiveExpand(java.lang.String unexpanded)
        Get the expanded equivalent of unexpanded values found as a System property, JPF Property or any described in config file. If needed, do a recursive process expanding on top levels.
        Parameters:
        unexpanded - Property that matches \$\{.*\} regex.
        Returns:
        expanded property or original if not found.

      • isExpandable

        public boolean isExpandable(java.lang.String expression)
        Check if expression matches \$\{.*\} regex in a simple way.
        Parameters:
        expression - Value of property to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if expression matches.

      • getLeafs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLeafs()

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf(java.lang.String key)
        Check if a property is a leaf of one of the JPF component hierarchy tree.
        Parameters:
        key - String describing the root property.
        Returns:
        true if .isleaf subproperty value is true.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType(java.lang.String key)
        Get value of subproperty type of given key.
        Parameters:
        key - String indicating the property key.
        Returns:
        type of component.

        public java.lang.String[] getPropertyVals(java.lang.String key)
